1219040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Winter Castle (Map Pack)
1219040.description:
Winter Castle

A castle in a winter wonderland surrounded by a partial frozen moat, a path from the sally port leads to a chapel.
The castle and the chapel can be used together or separated.
The castle has four floors and a cellar, the chapel has two floors and a crypt.
Every map have a corresponding DM map, a
total of 18 maps.
This Map Pack includes:
  • Overview
  • First floor
  • 2
    nd floor
  • 3
    rd floor
  • 4
    th floor
  • Cellar
  • Chapel overview
  • Chapel first floor
  • Chapel 2nd floor
  • Chapel crypt
All maps are made with tiles and tokens from Shockbolts fantastic art kits.
Converted by:  
Ragnar Tollesson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
